00020 GaussianDeviate::GaussianDeviate( string &dbdir ) 
00021     : _dbfilename(dbdir+"gaussdev.dat"), _current(0)
00022 {
00023 
00024     ifstream dbfile( _dbfilename.c_str(), ios::binary);
00025 
00026     // Set up random number generator
00027 
00028     gsl_rng_env_setup();                // set up random number system
00029     _rngtype = gsl_rng_taus;            // faster, simulation quality.
00030     _rng = gsl_rng_alloc( _rngtype );   // allocate random number generator
00031     _seed = (unsigned long) time(NULL); // seed to the current time
00032     gsl_rng_set( _rng, _seed );
00033 
00034     // set current to a random starting point
00035     _current = (int)(gsl_rng_uniform(_rng)*DBSIZE);
00036 
00037     // Attempt to read the database, or generate it if needed.
00038     if (dbfile.fail()) {
00039         cout << "Generating Gaussian Deviate database (this "
00040              << "only needs to be done once). "<<endl
00041              << "Please stand by..."<< endl;
00042         generate();
00043     }
00044     else {
00045         dbfile.read( (char*)_deviates, int(DBSIZE*sizeof(double)) );
00046     }
00047 
00048       
00049 }

00057 double
00058 GaussianDeviate::getFastDeviate() {
00059     _current++;
00060     if (_current>=DBSIZE) _current=0;
00061     return _deviates[_current];
00062 }

00064 void
00065 GaussianDeviate::generate() {
00066 
00067     // Calculate deviates...
00068     
00069     ProgressBar progress(DBSIZE);
00070     int count=0;
00071 
00072     for (int i=0; i<DBSIZE; i++) {
00073         _deviates[i] = gsl_ran_ugaussian(_rng);
00074 
00075         if (count == 10000){
00076             progress.print(i);
00077             count=0;
00078         }
00079         count++;
00080     }
00081     progress.printClear();
00082 
00083     // save to database...
00084 
00085     ofstream outfile( _dbfilename.c_str(),ios::binary|ios::out);
00086     
00087     if (outfile.fail()){
00088         cerr << "Couldn't save Gaussian Deviate database: "<< _dbfilename
00089              << endl;
00090         return;
00091     }
00092 
00093     outfile.write( (char*)_deviates, DBSIZE*sizeof(double) );
00094 
00095     // output a histogram for diagnostics
00096     
00097     Histogram testdev(100,-5,5,"Gaussian Deviate Diagnostic");
00098     for(int i=0; i<DBSIZE; i++) {
00099         testdev.increment(_deviates[i]);
00100     }
00101     //    testdev.fitGaussian( 0,99 );
00102     testdev.save(_dbfilename);
00103 
00104 }
